name: Autoclave (Stainless, Above 6L Capacity)
specifications: Bench-top unit; stainless steel chamber; volume â‰¥6L; secure locking lid; pressure and temperature gauges.
function: Sterilizes medical instruments, dressings, and laboratory materials using pressurized steam.
usage: Wear gloves and heat-resistant apron; load instruments in open baskets; add distilled water; set appropriate temperature and pressure; release steam safely after cycle.
maintenance: Allow chamber to cool before opening; drain and clean regularly to prevent mineral build-up; check door seal and pressure release valve frequently.
warning: Overfilling the chamber; opening lid while under pressure; using tap water instead of distilled water.
